New Records: Avishka Fernando scored 96, the highest individual score in the series
Dunith Wellalage took a five-wicket haul
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's interim coach Sanath Jayasuriya and captain Charith Asalanka celebrated the win
Rohit Sharma acknowledged India's struggles against spin
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on challenging pitch conditions
Avishka Fernando's innings was key to Sri Lanka's victory
